-   `c(1, 1L, "C")`

```{r}
c(1, 1L, "C")
```

```{r}
1
1L
"C"
```

```{r}
#typeof(c(1, 1L, "C"))
```

-   `c(1L / 0, "A")`

```{r}
c(1L / 0, "A")
```

```{r}
typeof(1L)
typeof(0)
typeof(1L/0)
typeof("A")
```

```{r}
#typeof(c(1L / 0, "A"))
```

-   `c(1:3, 5)`

```{r}
c(1:3, 5)
```

```{r}
typeof(1:3)
typeof(5)
```

```{r}
#typeof(c(1:3, 5))
```

-   `c(3, "3+")`

```{r}
c(3, "3+")
```

```{r}
typeof(3)
typeof("3+")
```

```{r}
#typeof(c(3, "3+"))
```

-   `c(NA, TRUE)`

```{r}
c(NA, TRUE)
```

```{r}
typeof(NA)
typeof(TRUE)
```

```{r}
#typeof(c(NA, TRUE))
```
